attributes.action: Cease resignation payments to incometent Government staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cease the obscene "goodbye" payments to all government officers/employees who leave as a result of their unsuitability or incompetence.
I the case of the recent Kent NHS Trust scandal , the offending executive and her seniors should be prosecuted for allowing an agreed resignation.
